name: Mojo
description:
"Mojo” is a new version of the famous game “2048”, an original approach to this well-known puzzle. Several beautiful girls will keep you company during the game. The more points you get, the less clothes remain on the girls.
Will you be able to make them strip completely?

This simple yet captivating game will help you train your brain (+100 IQ).

Before purchasing “Mojo”, it is recommended to test the free-of-charge version “Mojo: Hanako”.

https://store.steampowered.com/app/892630/Mojo_Hanako/
